<root><template><title>RV</title><part><name>type</name>=<value>command

</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value> arma3
</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>1.64
</value></part><part><name>arg</name>=<value> global

</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> Object Manipulation
</value></part><part><name>gr2</name>=<value> Render Time Scope

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Returns the position on the unit other units can aim at in render scope. See also [[aimPos]], [[unitAimPosition]].

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> '''unitAimPositionVisual''' unit

</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value> unit: [[Object]]

</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[Array]] - position in format [[PositionAGL]]
		  
</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>[[unitAimPositionVisual]] [[player]];</code>

</value></part><part><name>seealso</name>=<value> [[unitAimPosition]], [[aimPos]], [[eyePos]], [[getPosASL]], [[weaponDirection]]
</value></part></template>
